name: Five Element Strikes
description: Train the five core striking techniques based on the five elements in Xing Yi Quan.

cards.title: Pi Quan (Splitting Strike)
cards.description: A downward splitting strike representing the element of Metal.
bulletpoints: Drive the force downward in a cutting motion
Maintain a strong stance for stability
Focus on speed and fluidity between movements
cards.summaryText: Let Pi Quan fall like a blade, rooted stance steady while the cut stays fluid.

cards.title: Beng Quan (Crushing Strike)
cards.description: A forward-driving punch that embodies the element of Wood.
bulletpoints: Extend the punch in a straight line with force
Keep the shoulders relaxed for speed
Use the rear foot to generate forward momentum
cards.summaryText: Drive Beng Quan straight ahead with a relaxed frame and rear-foot surge.
